author: Karl Guttag
description: Rivet Industries was founded in 2024 by people that worked on Microsoft Hololens. In looking at their website, I discovered that they were using Lumus geometric waveguides. In addition to Microsoft, Rivet also has connections' in Peter Thiel's Palantir Technologies. Rivet may be more than your everyday startup.
title: Exclusive: Rivet Industries Using Lumus Waveguides for Military & Industrial AR
